1242915931485020324.Text: Oh yeah, sure. Heard ya the f-f-first time.

2055424201272744918.Text: A shame what happened to that man. He would have made an excellent advisor for me. Killed on a hunting trip. Tsk. He should have been more careful.

16792880249567867.Text: I'd only met the man once or twice myself, but he left a strong impression. Smart, charismatic...he could have been a leader of our people.

28224276712133513057.Text: Yes, I heard the poor man was killed while hunting. Odd, that. He was a powerful warrior, and should have been more careful. Rumor has it that Athyn Llethan was grooming him for the throne. He was Llethan's nephew. I suppose that is a moot point now, though.

78531361876305501.Text: I knew the man by reputation only. Sounds like he was a good man, but wasn't careful. It's a shame, but it's a dangerous world.

2116721184209614932.Text: Yes, I knew the young man. I also know he met an unfortunate end. Seems to me a great number of this new king's rivals have met with unfortunate ends. Quite a coincidence, don't you think?

19214278812657714147.Text: Oh, I knew young Talen. He was a fine young man. And King Llethan loved him like a son. I wonder if the truth about his death will ever be discovered.

13947286542843128007.Text: He was popular among the people. Spent time at the Temple as well. We investigated his death, but were unable to find anything conclusive. It was suspicious, though.

4295178412859911170.Text: I've heard of him. Heard he was dead, too. Shame to lose a good soldier, but he should have been more careful.

1806063051656222901.Text: He was a very popular figure here in Mournhold, with most people at least. King Llethan thought of the boy as a son, and was grooming him for the throne. Unfortunately, he met with an "accident" soon after Helseth arrived in Mournhold. Really a shame.

2753540241301320792.Text: Such a handsome young man, and well loved. We were all very sorry to hear of his death.

15409135473223954.Text: Now that was a man who would have been a leader to our people! King Llethan knew what he was doing when he began grooming that boy for the throne. Of course, that all changed when Helseth arrived. Poor Vandas was found dead soon after.

3153824047827916276.Text: He was a good man. Anyone who ever met him can tell you that. Would have made a fine king, too. Shame what happened.
